sentences.en: A condition in horses similar to but more advanced than thrush.
sentences.cn: 马的疽疡''.'症'. ''马的类似于蹄间腐烂但较之更为严重的一种病况.

sentences.en: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.cn: 一只鸫落在松树的树枝上。

sentences.en: American thrushes : wood thrush; hermit thrush ; veery.
sentences.cn: 美洲画眉鸟; 鸫科鸣鸟; 隐士夜鸫;威尔逊鸫.

sentences.en: AVOID THESE IF EITHER PARTNER HAS THRUSH ( SUGAR ENCOURAGES THRUSH )
sentences.cn: 若任何一方有鹅口疮请避免以上行为 ( 糖粉会导致鹅口疮恶化 )

sentences.en: European thrush common in rocky areas; the male has blackish plumage with a band neck.
sentences.cn: 常见于多岩石地区的欧洲画眉; 雄性有带黑色的羽毛,颈部有白带.

sentences.en: Fourth Elder Chang , a vigorous looking fellow , has a much large thrush cage.
sentences.cn: 常四爷雄赳赳的, 提着大而高的画眉笼.

sentences.en: My little son has a thrush.
sentences.cn: 我的小儿子得了鹅口疮.

sentences.en: North American thrush noted for its complex and appealing song.
sentences.cn: 以复杂而吸引人的啼叫闻名的北美洲画眉.

sentences.en: That's the wise thrush ; he sings each song twice over.
sentences.cn: 聪明的 鸫鸟 在那儿唱,把每只歌都唱两遍.

sentences.en: The American Robin ( Turdus migratorius ) a migratory songbird of the thrush family.
sentences.cn: 美洲知更鸟 ( 旅鸫 ) 是画眉科迁徙鸣鸟.

sentences.en: The singing voice of Japanese Thrush was heard in the forest.
sentences.cn: 我听在森林里听到乌灰鸫的鸣叫了.

sentences.en: The thrush is a kind of small singing bird.
Thrush have also come to be known as song birds as they have many attractive songs.
sentences.cn: 画眉同时因其吸引人的歌声而以会唱歌的鸟著称.

sentences.en: Thrush: a new bird for me ( and for Chi Gu )! Many congratulations on an excellent find!
sentences.cn: 鸫: 对我 ( 及七股 ) 是新鸟种! 非常恭喜这优秀的发现!

sentences.en: Using a spacer will also help reduce the possibility of thrush.
sentences.cn: 利用储药罐也会减少发生鹅口疮的可能.

words.tran_cn: 画眉；[口腔]鹅口疮；蹄叉腐疽

trans.tran_cn: 画眉鸟，[医]鹅口疮，（马的）蹄叉腐疽
